author: Fredaholic
title: Good set
review:
I got this set about 2 years ago while in New York to, fortunately, see a play other than Hamilton. Anyways, let's see what this small set has to offer!

Overview:

This set is extremely small. If you missed it, it has less than 8 pieces. Even with that, this exclusive set is great to put on your fridge or anything as memorabilia. It's fun and simple. You can tinker around with the arms, legs, and everything for a bit and still not get overly bored. 

Building/Finished Product:

Yes! This took me so long to build! Anyways, the set is alright. Nice exclusive pieces and nice figure. I would recommend if you're able to get it, pretty neat.
